summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_SHADER_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.

param.name: o
param.para: Type: const
Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_SHADER_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC structure.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_SHADER_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with values.

param.name: viewDimension
param.para: Type: D3D11_SRV_DIMENSION
A D3D11_SRV_DIMENSION-typed value that specifies the resource type of the view.

param.name: format
param.para: Type:
A -typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: mostDetailedMip
param.para: Type: UINT
Index of the most detailed mipmap level to use; this number is from 0 to mipLevels -1. For a buffer, this is the number of bytes between the beginning of the buffer and the first element to access.
FirstElement of .

param.name: mipLevels
param.para: Type: UINT
The maximum number of mipmap levels for the view. For a buffer, this is the total number of elements in the view. NumElements of .

param.name: firstArraySlice
param.para: Type: UINT
The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.
First2DArrayFace of .

param.name: arraySize
param.para: Type: UINT
Number of elements in the array. NumCubes of .

param.name: flags
param.para: Type: UINT
A -typed value that identifies view options for a buffer. For only.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_SHADER_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with D3D11_BUFFEREX_SRV values.

param.name: unnamedParam1
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Buffer interface for a buffer.

param.name: format
param.para: A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: firstElement
param.para: Number of bytes between the beginning of the buffer and the first element to access.

param.name: numElements
param.para: Total number of elements in the view.

param.name: flags
param.para: A D3D11_BUFFEREX_SRV_FLAG-typed value that identifies view options for a buffer.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_SHADER_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with D3D11_TEX1D_SRV or D3D11_TEX1D_ARRAY_SRV values.

param.name: pTex1D
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture1D interface for a 1D texture.

param.name: viewDimension
param.para: A D3D11_SRV_DIMENSION-typed value that specifies the resource type of the view.

param.name: format
param.para: A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: mostDetailedMip
param.para: Index of the most detailed mipmap level to use; this number is from 0 to mipLevels -1.

param.name: mipLevels
param.para: The maximum number of mipmap levels for the view.

param.name: firstArraySlice
param.para: The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.

param.name: arraySize
param.para: Number of elements in the array.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_SHADER_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with 2D texture values.

param.name: pTex2D
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture2D interface for a 2D texture.

param.name: viewDimension
param.para: A D3D11_SRV_DIMENSION-typed value that specifies the resource type of the view.

param.name: format
param.para: A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: mostDetailedMip
param.para: Index of the most detailed mipmap level to use; this number is from 0 to mipLevels -1.

param.name: mipLevels
param.para: The maximum number of mipmap levels for the view.

param.name: firstArraySlice
param.para: The index of the first element to use in an array of elements. First2DArrayFace of D3D11_TEXCUBE_ARRAY_SRV.

param.name: arraySize
param.para: Number of elements in the array. NumCubes of D3D11_TEXCUBE_ARRAY_SRV.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_SHADER_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with 3D texture values.

param.name: pTex3D
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture3D interface for a 3D texture.

param.name: format
param.para: A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: mostDetailedMip
param.para: Index of the most detailed mipmap level to use; this number is from 0 to mipLevels -1.

param.name: mipLevels
param.para: The maximum number of mipmap levels for the view.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_SHADER_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC structure.
